publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3785 Mr Andy Kerr: Human Tissue (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Human Tissue (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Lewis Macdonald*
S2M-3785 Mr Andy Kerr: Human Tissue (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Human Tissue (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Lewis Macdonald
